entities.name: krebber
entities.description: Kreacher is a house-elf who has been lurking in the attic. He is covered in dust and seems to be looking for more relics of the Black family.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is Harry's friend who found Kreacher in the attic.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts who has vague suspicions about Kreacher.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is a kind and caring person who calls Sirius's behavior 'fits of the sullens.'

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is a school where Harry and his friends attend.

relationships.description: Sirius found Kreacher in the attic.
Harry has vague suspicions about Kreacher.
Mrs. Weasley describes Sirius's behavior as 'fits of the sullens.'
Harry is a student at Hogwarts.
